---
name: Documentation Improvement
about: Provide feedback on the Project's Documentation
title: Please provide a short and descriptive title
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

**Feedback Type**
Would you like to report an issue with an existing page or propose an new one?

If above you answered (report an issue) fill these questions:

**Location** 
Which page does this issue concern? Feel free to provide a link

**Description**
Describe what is wrong with this page

**Solution**
Suggest a way we can fix this issue

**Additional Info**
State anything else you would like to say, feel free to attach images or other files

If in the first question (Feedback Type) you answered (suggest a new one) fill these questions:

**Page Subject**
What would this page be about?

**Location**
Where would this page be located?

**Layout**
Provide a crude layout of this page

**Additional Info**
State anything else you would like to say, feel free to attach images or other files
